channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: @Johnauthers 说，股市曾经希望降息。这就是它似乎不再关心的原因。
item.description:
The stock market used to want rate cuts, says @johnauthers. Here's why it doesn't seem to care anymore. https://t.co/Su0MYyAaf0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: @MarcRuby 撰文指出，东京证券交易所所有者的影响力正在深入董事会内部，并有助于提振股价。
item.description:
The influence of Tokyo's stock exchange owner is penetrating deeper inside boardrooms -- and helping boost share prices -- writes @MarcRuby https://t.co/an3bOH98i2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 维克托-欧尔班的女婿已成为匈牙利旅游业最著名的投资者，其中包括布达佩斯的一些标志性建筑

item.title: 由于经济强劲和销售市场艰难，二月份曼哈顿公寓租金上涨，租赁市场也随之繁忙起来。
item.description:
Manhattan apartment rents rose in February as a strong economy and tough sales market translated into a busy month for leasing https://t.co/SeSSVzdUNs

item.title: 韩国人在私立教育上的支出再创新高，部分原因是受到医学院入学热潮的推动
item.description:

item.title: 在法国和智利葡萄酒生产商抢占市场份额后，澳大利亚葡萄酒生产商泰勒酒业（Taylors Wines）认为关税结束后在中国重建品牌面临挑战
item.description:
Australian winemaker Taylors Wines sees challenges in rebuilding its brand in China once tariffs end, after French and Chilean vintners snapped up market share https://t.co/3CyLkc4T4y

item.title: 中国经济前景不明朗，给生产柴油的炼油厂带来压力，而柴油是中国大部分工业活动的燃料来源
item.description:
China’s uncertain economic prospects are stressing the oil refiners that produce diesel, the fuel that powers much of the country’s industrial activities https://t.co/uikPqWXPWc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一位资深立法者表示，日本央行可能最快于下周加息，政府需要理顺财政状况以降低金融风险
item.description:
With the BOJ likely to hike interest rates as soon as next week, the government needs to gets its fiscal house in order to mitigate financial risks, a senior lawmaker says https://t.co/4ta8sRfLOP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 由于市场猜测中国政府正在制定一项支持创新药物开发的计划，中国医药类股上涨
item.description:
Chinese pharmaceutical stocks rose amid speculation the government is working on a plan to support innovative drug development https://t.co/6TqsVMajid

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，全球最大的国家养老基金--日本 GPIF 最早将于周五宣布恢复外国股票的贷款业务
item.description:
The world's largest state pension fund, Japan’s GPIF, will announce as early as Friday that it will resume lending foreign stocks, sources say https://t.co/7sy63XWFeA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 印度小盘股暴跌 800 亿美元，预示着印度大盘的风险偏好正在下降

item.title: 印度小盘股的回调预示着风险偏好正在削弱整个市场，印度股市目前在亚太地区表现不佳

A correction in India’s small-cap stocks portends souring risk appetite on the broader market, which is now an underperformer in Asia Pacific https://t.co/qyUgeX1qMY

item.title: 日本国家支持的投资机构将继续斥资 60 亿美元收购芯片制造材料龙头企业 JSR
item.description:
A Japanese state-backed investment vehicle is going ahead with its $6 billion buyout of chipmaking materials linchpin JSR https://t.co/aMujKle82n

item.title: 由于投资者押注全球市场供应趋紧，铜价涨幅扩大至每吨 9,000 美元，达到 11 个月以来的最高点
item.description:
Copper extended gains toward $9,000 a ton, reaching its highest in 11 months, as investors bet on supplies tightening in the global market https://t.co/v2dM4cNu1I

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 对日元今年表现优于同类货币的预期几乎消失殆尽，策略师们现在预测日元在 2024 年年底的表现将在年初的几个百分点之内
item.description:
Expectations for the yen to outperform its peers this year have all but evaporated, with strategists now forecasting the currency to end 2024 within a few percent of where it started https://t.co/ijvjhWTcf5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 一名国家媒体记者在北京附近采访致命爆炸事件时受阻，中国官员对此表示道歉
item.description:
Chinese officials apologized after a state media journalist was prevented from covering a fatal explosion near Beijing https://t.co/hPYWFPQoB3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 新消息：澳大利亚正在努力应对日益加深的住房危机。然而，当涉及到最显而易见的解决方案时，城市居民却不愿意接受。
item.description:
NEW: Australia is grappling with a deepening housing crisis.

Yet when it comes to the most obvious solution, city dwellers just don’t want it. https://t.co/a3slwPJfFV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 修订后的数据显示，2023 年最后几个月离开新西兰的人数有所减少，因此新西兰的移民高峰高于之前的报告。
item.description:
New Zealand’s immigration peak was higher than previously reported after revisions showed fewer people left the country in the final months of 2023 https://t.co/V84TKRXIeX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 美世称，到 2048 年，一批庞大的养老基金将主导澳大利亚的退休体系，资产规模将达到 9 万亿美元。
item.description:
A group of massive pension funds will dominate Australia’s retirement system, with assets topping $9 trillion by 2048, Mercer says https://t.co/5Oz3tjUg2C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 淡马锡支持的曼尼帕尔健康公司正在寻求收购一家规模较小的印度连锁医院，这将有助于该公司超越阿波罗医院，成为印度顶级医疗服务提供商。
item.description:
Temasek-backed Manipal Health is looking to acquire a smaller India hospital chain, which can help it overtake Apollo Hospitals as the country’s top health-care provider https://t.co/rVmRdNjfAN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 亚洲各国的通胀压力正在恢复，这表明对该地区债券的支持正在减弱

Asian nations are seeing a revival in inflation pressures, signaling weakening support for the region’s bonds https://t.co/MH209whEhE

item.title: 英国 2 月份房地产市场回暖，在价格稳定后，新买家咨询量和待售房产数量均有所增加
item.description:
Britain’s housing market picked up in February, with an increase in both new buyer inquires and properties for sale after prices stabilized https://t.co/CrlI84WuwK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 倒闭的英国百货连锁店德本汉姆（Debenhams）正在转移其养老金债务，这将是英国第二笔养老金超级基金交易
item.description:
Debenhams, the collapsed British department-store chain, is transferring its pension obligations in what will be the UK’s second pension superfund deal https://t.co/g7z5N8UtnH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 14, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚正努力应对不断上涨的住房成本和创纪录的移民增长，政府正在努力增加住房供应。但在悉尼，一些居民正在抗议这一计划。原因如下
item.description:
As Australia grapples with rising housing costs and record migration growth, the government is working to boost housing supply. But in Sydney, some residents are protesting against the plan. Here's why https://t.co/kucwZTsXRa pic.twitter.com/3v8RujQGpr

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) March 14, 2024
